About Me

Howdy! My name is Tim Filipowski, I am a full stack web developer working with HTML5, CSS3, Sass, and JavaScript. I am familiar with Python and Django as I went to a Coding Dojo Python/Django Bootcamp and Graduated in April 2021. I had to take a break from coding during fall/winter to move Home to Indiana and help out the family :-)

Currently I am interested learning the MERN stack and doing freelance work. I think that Web Development connects people and has an impact every day of our lives. My goal is to build Web Applications that can help change the world!
